#summary This document covers the fundamentals of building applications using JSC3D.

= Getting Started with JSC3D =

JSC3D is very easy to setup and requires only a few lines of code to initialize.

As JSC3D uses <strong>[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/HTML/Canvas canvas]</strong> element for rendering, the first step is to declare a canvas in the <strong>body</strong> segment of the page.

{{{
<body>
    <canvas id="cv" width=640 height=480></canvas>
</body>
}}}
